A: 1. Peaceful Co-existence means different people living together in _ (a) conflict (b) peace (c) anger)
2. When people live together without disagreement, there is peaceful _ (a) co-operation (b) co-existence (c) competition)
3. Who taught us to live peacefully with others? (a) Moses (b) David (c) Jesus)
4. Jesus advised us to _ those who offend us. (a) punish (b) ignore (c) forgive)
5. God wants us to live peacefully with others in the _ (a) city (b) community (c) desert)
6. Esau and Jacob reconciled after Jacob took Esau's _ (a) land (b) blessings (c) money)
7. Which pair showed peaceful co-existence in the Bible? (a) Cain and Abel (b) Philemon and Onesimus (c) Goliath and David)
8. Isaac and Abimelech are examples of people desiring peaceful _ (a) separation (b) co-existence (c) war)
9. Abraham prevented a quarrel between himself and his nephew, _ (a) Isaac (b) Jacob (c) Lot)
10. It is good to show _ to others. (a) anger (b) love (c) fear)
11. Jesus wants us to show love and _ to people. (a) hostility (b) hospitality (c) cruelty)
12. We should tell others the _ (a) lies (b) truth (c) stories)
13. Jonathan and David showed _ love to each other. (a) selfish (b) unselfish (c) conditional)
14. Jonathan loved David as his own _ (a) brother (b) friend (c) soul)
15. Who planned to kill David? (a) Jonathan (b) King Saul (c) Abraham)
16. Jonathan saved David by telling him the plans of _ (a) David (b) Saul (c) Lot)
17. Jonathan and David made a _ (a) promise (b) covenant (c) agreement)
18. Pupils should show _ to one another. (a) indifference (b) love (c) hatred)
19. We should give help to the _ (a) rich (b) needy (c) strong)
20. We should _ our belongings with others. (a) hide (b) keep (c) share)
B: 2. Who did Jonathan love as his own soul? _________
3. Which king planned to kill David? _________
4. Who reconciled after Jacob took the blessings from his father? _________
5. What should pupils do with their belongings? _________
C: 1. What is the core meaning of peaceful co-existence?
2. Who showed unselfish love to David?
3. What quality should we show to people according to Jesus?
4. List one way pupils can show love.
5. What did Abraham prevent between him and Lot?
